languages.text: "Любого, кто не исполняет волю Лорд-капитана, ждет подобная участь. Служители Кровавой паутины верны своему слову, и не щадят оступившихся".
"The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."
languages.original_text: "Любого, кто не исполняет волю Лорд-капитана, ждет подобная участь. Служители Кровавой паутины верны своему слову, и не щадят оступившихся".

traits.locale_text: "That will be the lot of anyone who doesn't do the Lord Captain's bidding. The Bloodspun Web is faithful to its oaths and has no mercy for those who've strayed."
"That will be the lot of anyone who doesn't do the Lord Captain's bidding. The Bloodspun Web is faithful to its oaths and has no mercy for those who've strayed."
"The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."
"The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."
"The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."

languages.text: « La désobéissance est punie de mort. La Toile de Sang a fait serment d'allégeance {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} et n'aura aucune pitié pour les parjures. »
languages.original_text: "The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."

traits.locale_text: « La désobéissance est punie de mort. La Toile de Sang a fait serment d'allégeance {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} et n'aura aucune pitié pour les parjures. »

languages.text: «El castigo por la desobediencia es la muerte. La Red Sanguinolenta ha hecho un juramento ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y no tolera que nadie lo rompa».
languages.original_text: "The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."

traits.locale_text: «El castigo por la desobediencia es la muerte. La Red Sanguinolenta ha hecho un juramento ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y no tolera que nadie lo rompa».

languages.text: “忤逆命令的惩罚就是死亡。织血罗网向舰长大人发过誓，他们绝不会对背弃誓言的人手下留情。”
languages.original_text: "The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."

traits.locale_text: “忤逆命令的惩罚就是死亡。织血罗网向舰长大人发过誓，他们绝不会对背弃誓言的人手下留情。”

languages.text: 「不服従の罰は死だ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブはロード・キャプテンに誓った。そして誓いを破った者には、慈悲を示さない」
languages.original_text: "The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."

traits.locale_text: 「不服従の罰は死だ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブはロード・キャプテンに誓った。そして誓いを破った者には、慈悲を示さない」

languages.text: "Auf Ungehorsam steht die Todesstrafe. Das Blutgesponnene Netz hat einen Eid dem Lord Captain gegenüber geleistet, und es zeigt Eidbrechern gegenüber keine Gnade."
languages.original_text: "The penalty for disobedience is death. The Bloodspun Web made a vow to the Lord Captain, and will show no mercy to oathbreakers."

traits.locale_text: "Auf Ungehorsam steht die Todesstrafe. Das Blutgesponnene Netz hat einen Eid dem Lord Captain gegenüber geleistet, und es zeigt Eidbrechern gegenüber keine Gnade."
